title: Ticket #597: New CondorView user interface
description:
CondorView should have a new user interface. It should support graphing a potentially arbitrary information (#594) as served by CondorView via SOAP or similar (#596). It should take what type of graph to draw (bar/line/area, stacked/not-stacked) from the server (again #596).

We should consider making it easy to embed a particular graph, with user tuning, elsewhere, so people can make shiny dashboards for presentations.

Proposed is an AJAX interface using an existing JavaScript graphing library.
